entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The Snitch is described as circling the Gryffindor goal post and vanishing again. It's a small, golden object that Harry and Cho are trying to catch.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is introduced as appearing out of thin air, blocking Harry's path. She's described as grinning and following Harry on her broomstick.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character, accelerating towards the Snitch with his eyes fixed on it. He's instructed by Wood to knock Cho off her broom if necessary.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is introduced as roaring at Harry to be more aggressive and knock Cho off her broom.

relationships.description: Cho decides to mark Harry rather than search for the Snitch herself, so she follows him on her broomstick.
Harry is trying to catch the Snitch, accelerating towards it and diving to get a better look.
Cho initially decides to search for the Snitch herself rather than mark Harry.
